comments.comment_content:
go build 完成后并没有生成可执行的文件，./gravitee-server migrate报错，后续步骤无法下去，请老师帮忙看看。

go/src/gravitee  master ✗                                                                                                                                                                                                 3y52d ⚑ ◒  
▶ go build gravitee-server.go 
gravitee-server.go:7:2: no required module provides package github.com/spring2go/gravitee/cmd: go.mod file not found in current directory or any parent directory; see 'go help modules'
gravitee-server.go:8:2: no required module provides package github.com/urfave/cli: go.mod file not found in current directory or any parent directory; see 'go help modules'


go/src/gravitee  master ✗                                                                                                                                                                                                 3y52d ⚑ ◒  
▶ ./gravitee-server migrate
zsh: no such file or directory: ./gravitee-server

discussion.discussion_content: 你要在项目根目录下先执行 go mod init gravitee , 查看是否有go.mod ，然后执行 go mod tidy 下载依赖包
